string.value: This is your fourth assignment as an informant and even though you found the puppeteer's cave, you couldn't enter because you didn't have the password. The code might be written on #p1061006#. Go talk to #p1061006# at #m105040300#.

Rotating the #p1061006# might reveal the scribbles, but it's not moving. Wait a minute, the statue seems to be talking to you directly. 'I want 100 #t4000007#s.' Now you've heard of some outrageous demands, but a statue demanding something from you? Really? Oh well, better find some #t4000007#s.\r\n\r\n#i4000007# #t4000007# #b#c4000007# / 100#k

You found the scribble on #p1061006#. It's written in a near-illegible scribble, but you can still make it out. It says: 'Francis is a genius puppeteer!' All the words in the password have to be exact, including the capitalization and spacing, so be careful.
